title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 89 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 89 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I will sing of the mercies of the LORD for ever: with my mouth will I make known thy faithfulness to all generations.
lineList.cn: （以斯拉人以探的训诲诗）我要歌唱耶和华的慈爱，直到永远。我要用口将你的信实传与万代。

lineList.en: For I have said, Mercy shall be built up for ever: thy faithfulness shalt thou establish in the very heavens.
lineList.cn: 因我曾说，你的慈悲，必建立到永远。你的信实，必坚立在天上。

lineList.en: I have made a covenant with my chosen, I have sworn unto David my servant,
lineList.cn: 我与我所拣选的人立了约，向我的仆人大卫起了誓。

lineList.en: Thy seed will I establish for ever, and build up thy throne to all generations. Selah.
lineList.cn: 我要建立你的后裔，直到永远，要建立你的宝座，直到万代。

lineList.en: And the heavens shall praise thy wonders, O LORD: thy faithfulness also in the congregation of the saints.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，诸天要称赞你的奇事。在圣者的会中，要称赞你的信实。

lineList.en: For who in the heaven can be compared unto the LORD? who among the sons of the mighty can be likened unto the LORD?
lineList.cn: 在天空谁能比耶和华呢。神的众子中，谁能像耶和华呢。

lineList.en: God is greatly to be feared in the assembly of the saints, and to be had in reverence of all them that are about him.
lineList.cn: 他在圣者的会中，是大有威严的神，比一切在他四围的更可畏惧。

lineList.en: O LORD God of hosts, who is a strong LORD like unto thee? or to thy faithfulness round about thee?
lineList.cn: 耶和华万军之神阿，那一个大能者像你耶和华。你的信实，是在你的四围。

lineList.en: Thou rulest the raging of the sea: when the waves thereof arise, thou stillest them.
lineList.cn: 你管辖海的狂傲。波浪翻腾，你就使他平静了。

lineList.en: Thou hast broken Rahab in pieces, as one that is slain; thou hast scattered thine enemies with thy strong arm.
lineList.cn: 你打碎了拉哈伯似乎是已杀的人。你用有能的膀臂打散了你的仇敌。

lineList.en: The heavens are thine, the earth also is thine: as for the world and the fulness thereof, thou hast founded them.
lineList.cn: 天属你，地也属你。世界和其中所充满的，都为你所建立。

lineList.en: The north and the south thou hast created them: Tabor and Hermon shall rejoice in thy name.
lineList.cn: 南北为你所创造。他泊和黑门都因你的名欢呼。

lineList.en: Thou hast a mighty arm: strong is thy hand, and high is thy right hand.
lineList.cn: 你有大能的膀臂。你的手有力，你的右手也高举。

lineList.en: Justice and judgment are the habitation of thy throne: mercy and truth shall go before thy face.
lineList.cn: 公义和公平，是你宝座的根基。慈爱和诚实，行在你前面。

lineList.en: Blessed is the people that know the joyful sound: they shall walk, O LORD, in the light of thy countenance.
lineList.cn: 知道向你欢呼的，那民是有福的。耶和华阿，他们在你脸上的光里行走。

lineList.en: In thy name shall they rejoice all the day: and in thy righteousness shall they be exalted.
lineList.cn: 他们因你的名终日欢乐，因你的公义得以高举。

lineList.en: For thou art the glory of their strength: and in thy favour our horn shall be exalted.
lineList.cn: 你是他们力量的荣耀。因为你喜悦我们，我们的角必被高举。

lineList.en: For the LORD is our defence; and the Holy One of Israel is our king.
lineList.cn: 我们的盾牌属耶和华。我们的王属以色列的圣者。

lineList.en: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
lineList.cn: 当时你在异象中晓谕你的圣民，说，我以把救助之力，加在有能者的身上。我高举那从民中所拣选的

lineList.en: I have found David my servant; with my holy oil have I anointed him:
lineList.cn: 我寻得我的仆人大卫，用我的圣膏膏他。

lineList.en: With whom my hand shall be established: mine arm also shall strengthen him.
lineList.cn: 我的手必使他竖立。我的膀臂也必坚固他。

lineList.en: The enemy shall not exact upon him; nor the son of wickedness afflict him.
lineList.cn: 仇敌必不勒索他，凶恶之子，也不苦害他。

lineList.en: And I will beat down his foes before his face, and plague them that hate him.
lineList.cn: 我要在他面前打碎他的敌人，击杀那恨他的人。

lineList.en: But my faithfulness and my mercy shall be with him: and in my name shall his horn be exalted.
lineList.cn: 只是我的信实，和我的慈爱，要与他同在。因我的名，他的角必被高举。

lineList.en: I will set his hand also in the sea, and his right hand in the rivers.
lineList.cn: 我要使他的左手伸到海上，右手伸到河上。

lineList.en: He shall cry unto me, Thou art my father, my God, and the rock of my salvation.
lineList.cn: 他要称呼我说，你是我的父是我的神，是拯救我的磐石。

lineList.en: Also I will make him my firstborn, higher than the kings of the earth.
lineList.cn: 我也要立他为长子，为世上最高的君王。

lineList.en: My mercy will I keep for him for evermore, and my covenant shall stand fast with him.
lineList.cn: 我要为他存留我的慈爱，直到永远。我与他立的约，必要坚定。

lineList.en: His seed also will I make to endure for ever, and his throne as the days of heaven.
lineList.cn: 我也要使他的后裔，存到永远，使他的宝座，如天之久。

lineList.en: If his children forsake my law, and walk not in my judgments;
lineList.cn: 倘若他的子孙离弃我的律法，不照我的典章行。

lineList.en: If they break my statutes, and keep not my commandments;
lineList.cn: 背弃我的律例，不遵守我的诫命。

lineList.en: Then will I visit their transgression with the rod, and their iniquity with stripes.
lineList.cn: 我就要用杖责罚他们的过犯，用鞭责罚他们的罪孽。

lineList.en: Nevertheless my lovingkindness will I not utterly take from him, nor suffer my faithfulness to fail.
lineList.cn: 只是我必不将我的慈爱，全然收回，也必不叫我的信实废弃。

lineList.en: My covenant will I not break, nor alter the thing that is gone out of my lips.
lineList.cn: 我必不背弃我的约，也不改变我口中所出的。

lineList.en: Once have I sworn by my holiness that I will not lie unto David.
lineList.cn: 我一次指着自己的圣洁起誓。我决不向大卫说谎。

lineList.en: His seed shall endure for ever, and his throne as the sun before me.
lineList.cn: 他的后裔要存到永远，他的宝座在我面前，如日之恒一般。

lineList.en: It shall be established for ever as the moon, and as a faithful witness in heaven. Selah.
lineList.cn: 又如月亮永远坚立，如天上确实的见证。（细拉）

lineList.en: But thou hast cast off and abhorred, thou hast been wroth with thine anointed.
lineList.cn: 但你恼怒你的受膏者，就丢掉弃绝他。

lineList.en: Thou hast made void the covenant of thy servant: thou hast profaned his crown by casting it to the ground.
lineList.cn: 你厌恶了与仆人所立的约，将他的冠冕践踏于地。

lineList.en: Thou hast broken down all his hedges; thou hast brought his strong holds to ruin.
lineList.cn: 你拆毁了他一切的篱笆。使他的保障，变为荒场。

lineList.en: All that pass by the way spoil him: he is a reproach to his neighbours.
lineList.cn: 凡过路的人，都抢夺他。他成为邻邦的羞辱。

lineList.en: Thou hast set up the right hand of his adversaries; thou hast made all his enemies to rejoice.
lineList.cn: 你高举了他敌人的右手。你叫他一切的仇敌欢喜。

lineList.en: Thou hast also turned the edge of his sword, and hast not made him to stand in the battle.
lineList.cn: 你叫他的刀剑卷刃，叫他在争战之中站立不住。

lineList.en: Thou hast made his glory to cease, and cast his throne down to the ground.
lineList.cn: 你使他的光辉止息，将他的宝座推倒于地。

lineList.en: The days of his youth hast thou shortened: thou hast covered him with shame. Selah.
lineList.cn: 你减少他青年的日子。又使他蒙羞。（细拉）

lineList.en: How long, LORD? wilt thou hide thyself for ever? shall thy wrath burn like fire?
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，这要到几时呢。你要将自己隐藏到永远吗。你的忿怒如火焚烧，要到几时呢。

lineList.en: Remember how short my time is: wherefore hast thou made all men in vain?
lineList.cn: 求你想念我的时候是何等的短少。你创造世人，要使他们归何等的虚空呢。（细拉）

lineList.en: What man is he that liveth, and shall not see death? shall he deliver his soul from the hand of the grave? Selah.
lineList.cn: 谁能常活免死，救他的灵魂脱离阴间的权柄呢。（细拉）

lineList.en: Lord, where are thy former lovingkindnesses, which thou swarest unto David in thy truth?
lineList.cn: 主阿，你从前凭你的信实向大卫立誓，要施行的慈爱在那里呢。

lineList.en: Remember, Lord, the reproach of thy servants; how I do bear in my bosom the reproach of all the mighty people;
lineList.cn: 主阿，求你记念仆人们所受的羞辱，记念我怎样将一切强盛民的羞辱存在我怀里。

lineList.en: Wherewith thine enemies have reproached, O LORD; wherewith they have reproached the footsteps of thine anointed.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你的仇敌，用这羞辱，羞辱了你的仆人，羞辱了你受膏者的脚踪。

lineList.en: Blessed be the LORD for evermore. Amen, and Amen.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是应当称颂的，直到永远。阿们，阿们。
